message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.  I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the product. However, I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your interest and your offer. I understand your perspective, but $18,000 is really where I need to be to make this work. This product is worth a significant investment due to [mention a key feature or benefit]. I'm confident you'll see a strong return on that investment.  Would you be willing to meet me at $16,000?

I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $16,000. I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will allow us to come to an agreement.
